channel.description: Recent content in Redis on ┬──┬﻿ ノ( ゜-゜ノ) (╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻

item.title: Base usefull commands
item.author: me@vpopov.org (Vadym Popov)
item.description: Redis multi actions Remove values by pattern redis-cli -h dev-1.example.com EVAL "local keys = redis.call('keys', ARGV[1]) for i=1,#keys,5000 do redis.call('del', unpack(keys, i, math.min(i+4999, #keys))) end return keys" 0 pattern:* Check TTL by pattern redis-cli -h dev-1.example.com EVAL " local ttls = {} for i, name in ipairs(redis.call('KEYS', ARGV[1])) do ttls[i] = {redis.call('ttl', name), name}; end return ttls" 0 *pattern* Rsync Create and transfer archive directly to the remote host $ tar -zc .
